title: New: Wind & Walls – Holiday (Getaway)
body:
Just when you’d thought Australia had just about exhausted the dream-pop mines (those totally exist), Brisbane duo **Wind & Walls** come along with this rather fantastic debut outing.

_Holiday (Getaway)_ (not a [Madonna cover](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Holiday_(Madonna_song)), as they’re all too keen to point out), is a reverb heavy, intricately composed gem, with the magical atmosphere more than making up for any possible misgivings surrounding the slightly basic production. With little information available on **Wind & Walls **(the male member also records under the name [Boy Venus](https://soundcloud.com/boyvenus) … I think…), aside from this track and references to Wild Nothing, The Middle East and John Mayer, it’ll be mightily interesting to see what the duo come up with next.
